interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BYS Kabuki Brush
Review Date: 2018/03/03
Store: BYS
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BYS', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '0.04 x 0.02 x 0.02 inches', 'Item Weight': '36 Grams', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.04 x 0.02 x 0.02 inches; 1.27 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BC/BYNKBS', 'Manufacturer': 'BYS'}
Review Text: It's smaller than expected. I thought it would be bigger because of the price. Is is a very soft brush and good for blending powder and buffing because it's not scratchy, I hate scratchy brushes. It's good to travel with. It also sheds a little bit at first washing.
Review Title: Is is a very soft brush and good for blending powder and buffing because it's not scratchy
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Prefers soft, quality brushes that provide good blending and buffing capabilities. Prioritizes comfort over size and dislikes scratchy brushes.
- **Travel-Friendly:** Values compact, easy-to-transport products for travel.
- **Expectation vs. Reality:** Expects products to meet size expectations relative to price and often feels disappointed when they don't.
- **Quality Concerns:** Cares about shedding, indicating a preference for durable products that maintain quality over time.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Shows a tendency to rate products more critically when they don't meet initial expectations, as evidenced by a mid-range rating despite positive attributes. 

This initial profile suggests the user values comfort, functionality, and reliability in cosmetic tools.
